title: Associations & Relationships
description: Build a blog system using GORM that demonstrates database relationships including one-to-many and many-to-many associations between users, posts, and tags.
short_description: Learn GORM associations and build a blog system with relationships
real_world_connection: Blog systems and content management platforms commonly use these relationship patterns to organize users, content, and categorization.
requirements: Query users with their posts using preloading
Load posts with user and tag associations
